title.narrative: 2014 Management Project - Intercollegiate Model African Union Summit

description.narrative: Support for the implementation of the 2014 intercollegiate model African Union summit, to be hosted at University of Oxford. Three day conference from 26-29 September, 2014. Participants will include university students and alumni from Africa and the diaspora. 5-7 MCF Scholars may participate as delegates.

participating-org.narrative: Youth Alliance for Leadership and Development in Africa
